mapper.select: select id, todo, detail, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt from todos
select id, todo, detail, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt from todos where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into todos( todo, detail, created_at, updated_at ) values( #{todo}, #{detail}, current_timestamp, current_timestamp )
mapper.update: update todos set todo = #{todo}, detail = #{detail}, updated_at = current_timestamp where id = #{id}
